news.title: Murder arrest as mum and three children die in fire
news.summary: A 41-year-old man was arrested at the scene on suspicion of murder and remains in custody.

news.title: Yachts an easy way to bring migrants to UK, says ex-smuggler
news.summary: Former British soldier describes smuggling dozens of Vietnamese into marinas in English seaside towns.

news.title: Thirteen killed in wave of Russian attacks across Ukraine
news.summary: At least 13 people were killed the the latest Russian aerial attack across Ukraine

news.title: 'It's going to be ugly': Westminster braces for Spending Review
news.summary: As the chancellor prepares to set government budgets for future years, who are likely winners and losers?

news.title: Israeli strike kills nine of Gaza doctor's children, hospital says
news.summary: A British surgeon working in Nasser Hospital said he had operated on the doctor's surviving 11-year-old.

news.title: Boris and Carrie Johnson announce birth of fourth child
news.summary: The former PM's wife says the family is "totally smitten" by their daughter, Poppy.

news.title: 'I don't know what we'll do' - Vapers panic-buy ahead of disposables ban
news.summary: Some disposable vape users say they are stockpiling, worried about what they will do after the ban.

news.title: Kneecap defiant at first major gig since terror charge
news.summary: The Irish-language hip-hop trio play their biggest ever festival headline slot in south London.

news.title: There is an alternative, Labour MPs tell Reeves
news.summary: Some MPs are calling on the chancellor to raise taxes on the wealthy instead of cutting welfare.

news.title: Sabotage suspected as power cut hits Cannes Film Festival
news.summary: A substation was set on fire and a pylon damaged, interrupting screenings and affecting 160,000 homes.
